name: Sunset Matches
description: Sunset Matches is a dating app designed to bring meaningful connections through personalized matchmaking. The app focuses on fostering genuine relationships by matching users based on shared interests and values, ensuring high-quality interactions.
KeyFeatures: Personalized matchmaking based on interests and values
Curated profiles to ensure high-quality matches
In-app events and activities to engage users
Skills: React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, AWS

name: Foodash
description: Foodash is a food delivery application that provides users with access to local restaurants and fast food services. It features a seamless ordering process, real-time delivery tracking, and personalized restaurant recommendations.
KeyFeatures: User-friendly interface for quick food ordering
Skills: React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, AWS

name: MediAssis
description: MediAssis provides users with tools to track their daily activities, receive personalized recommendations, and participate in community challenges.  By combining activity tracking with personalized insights and eco-friendly suggestions, MediAssis aims to make it easier for users to adopt more sustainable practices.
Skills: React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, AWS

name: Jumia Clone
description: EcoTrack is a mobile and web application designed to help users monitor and reduce their carbon footprint. It provides personalized recommendations, tracks daily activities, and offers community challenges to encourage sustainable living.
Skills: React Native, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL, AWS
